posts.post_content:
Hello,

Is anyone aware of a good guide book for postcards and exhibits? Not really interested in prices so much, just something that will give some guidance as to what is available. Thanks in advance for any help!!!

Mark

I forgot to include that I would like to have something that covered all sports and maybe even westerns/movie stars.

Mark
